title: Gujarat Woman Killed Daughters & Self Due to Hunger? Fake Alert!
subtitle: Gujarat Woman Killed Daughters & Self Due to Hunger Fact Check: A video claiming that it shows a Gujarati family which committed suicide due to hunger and poverty during the COVID lockdown is being massively shared on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video claiming that it shows a Gujarati family that killed itself due to hunger and poverty during the COVID lockdown is being massively shared on social media. However, the claim is misleading and police investigation revealed a different reason for the suicide.

The mother hanged herself after strangling her two daughters on 2 May in Gujarat’s Morbi on the suspicion that her husband was cheating on her.
